data.comment: Allard Lindhout starts the match. Enschede with the kick-off in Amsterdam.
Queensy Menig scores to make it 0-1 at Johan Cruijff Arena.
In the minute 22, Julio Pleguezuelo with an assist there.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Allard Lindhout blows to start the second-half. Ajax with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Erik ten Hag (Ajax) is making a first substitution, with Brian Brobbey replacing Lassina Franck Traore.
The home team have replaced Perr Schuurs with Jurrien Timber. This is the second substitution made today by Erik ten Hag.
Erik ten Hag is making the team's third substitution at Johan Cruijff Arena with Lisandro Martinez replacing Nicolas Tagliafico.
In the minute 56, Antony Santos is replacing Quincy Promes for Ajax at Johan Cruijff Arena.
An attacking Ajax player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Dusan Tadic scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
In the minute 79, Ron Jans (Enschede) is making a first substitution, with Jesse Bosch replacing Luka Ilic.
The away team replace Vaclav Cerny with Leeuwen Thijs Van.
Ron Jans is making the team's third substitution at Johan Cruijff Arena with Mees Hilgers replacing Tyronne Ebuehi.
In the minute 83, Ryan Gravenberch (Ajax) gets a yellow card.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Queensy Menig.
That's a fine assist from Wout Brama.
In the minute 85, Klaas-Jan Huntelaar is replacing Sean Klaiber for Ajax at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Alexander Jeremejeff is on a sub for Danilo for Enschede.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
The away team have replaced Queensy Menig with Ramiz Zerrouki. This is the fifth substitution made today by Ron Jans.
